name: Building Blocks
description:
Description:

Build things, then tear it down using one of three tools at your disposal!

Key Features:

First you build, then...

- Car goes woosh

- Bomb goes boom

- Cannon goes bang

Credits:

- Artem Gulyaev

University of Europe for Applied Sciences:

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
